high_signal_items.title: Explainable Patterns in Cryptocurrency Microstructure
high_signal_items.why_it_matters: The study identifies stable cross-asset patterns in cryptocurrency limit-order-book microstructure, suggesting the potential for a universal feature library for crypto markets. This could lead to more robust trading strategies across different cryptocurrencies, especially during market distress events like flash crashes.

high_signal_items.title: A unified theory of order flow, market impact, and volatility
high_signal_items.why_it_matters: The paper proposes a microstructural model that reconciles empirical properties like persistent signed order flow and rough volatility. This model could enhance understanding of market dynamics and improve prediction of market impact, offering a potential edge in high-frequency trading.

high_signal_items.title: Generative AI for Stock Selection
high_signal_items.why_it_matters: This research demonstrates that generative AI can automate feature discovery in stock selection, potentially reducing manual effort and improving prediction accuracy. The AI-generated features show weak correlation with traditional features, suggesting new dimensions for alpha generation.

new_agent_ideas.edge_hypothesis: Stable cross-asset patterns in cryptocurrency microstructure can be exploited for arbitrage opportunities across different cryptocurrencies.
new_agent_ideas.test_plan: Backtest using historical order book data from multiple cryptocurrencies to identify arbitrage opportunities based on identified microstructure patterns.

new_agent_ideas.edge_hypothesis: Understanding the relationship between order flow, market impact, and volatility can improve predictions of volatility spikes and market impact.
new_agent_ideas.test_plan: Simulate trading strategies that predict volatility spikes based on order flow patterns and test against historical volatility data.

new_agent_ideas.edge_hypothesis: Generative AI can discover novel features that enhance stock selection models, leading to improved return predictions.
new_agent_ideas.test_plan: Integrate AI-generated features into existing stock selection models and compare performance against traditional models in a live trading environment.

new_data_sources.name: Binance Futures Perpetual Contract Data
new_data_sources.use_case: Used for analyzing cryptocurrency microstructure patterns and developing arbitrage strategies.

new_data_sources.name: Analyst Reports and Options Data
new_data_sources.use_case: Utilized in generative AI models for feature discovery in stock selection.
